languages.text: {n}Впрочем, не только кулаки. Вы видите, как руки некоторых скользят под одежду и будто бы ложатся на оружейные рукояти. В толпе мелькает блеск, хорошо вам известный — это блеск оружейной {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}пластали{/g}.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Впрочем, не только кулаки. Вы видите, как руки некоторых скользят под одежду и будто бы ложатся на оружейные рукояти. В толпе мелькает блеск, хорошо вам известный — это блеск оружейной {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}пластали{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and rest on weapon grips. You spot in the crowd a glint of gun metal that you are all too familiar with.{/n}
{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and rest on weapon grips. You spot in the crowd a glint of gun metal that you are all too familiar with.{/n}
{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of gun metal.{/n}
{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of gun metal.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero sus puños no son sus únicas herramientas. Ves que algunas manos se deslizan bajo la ropa y agarran la empuñadura de armas ocultas. Entre la multitud, atisbas el más que familiar reflejo del {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}metal de una pistola{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero sus puños no son sus únicas herramientas. Ves que algunas manos se deslizan bajo la ropa y agarran la empuñadura de armas ocultas. Entre la multitud, atisbas el más que familiar reflejo del metal de una pistola.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、道具はそれだけではない。服の下に手が滑り込み、武器のグリップをぎゅっと掴む様子が見える。人込みのどこかで、あまりにも見慣れた{g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}銃の金属{/g}がキラリと光る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、道具はそれだけではない。服の下に手が滑り込み、武器のグリップをぎゅっと掴む様子が見える。人込みのどこかで、あまりにも見慣れた銃の金属がキラリと光る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，他们手里的武器并不是唯一的武器。除此之外，你看到几个人的手滑向了衣服里，握紧了武器的握把。在人群中的某个地方，你瞥见了再熟悉不过的{g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}金属{/g}闪光，那是枪械的闪光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，他们手里的武器并不是唯一的武器。除此之外，你看到几个人的手滑向了衣服里，握紧了武器的握把。在人群中的某个地方，你瞥见了再熟悉不过的金属闪光，那是枪械的闪光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doch sie sind nicht die einzigen derartigen Werkzeuge. Du siehst, wie Hände unter Kleidung gleiten und sich um Waffengriffe legen. Irgendwo in der Menge siehst du das nur allzu vertraute Funkeln einer {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}metallenen{/g} Pistole aufblitzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Doch sie sind nicht die einzigen derartigen Werkzeuge. Du siehst, wie Hände unter Kleidung gleiten und sich um Waffengriffe legen. Irgendwo in der Menge siehst du das nur allzu vertraute Funkeln einer metallenen Pistole aufblitzen.{/n}

{n}Doch sie sind nicht die einzigen derartigen Werkzeuge. Du siehst, wie Hände unter Kleidung gleiten und sich um Waffengriffe legen. Irgendwo in der Menge siehst du das nur allzu vertraute Funkeln einer metallenen Pistole aufblitzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mais ce ne sont pas les seuls. Vous voyez des mains se glisser sous des vêtements pour se poser sur des poignées d'armes. Dans la foule qui se tient devant vous, vous apercevez des {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}éclats de métal{/g} qui vous sont par trop familiers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mais ce ne sont pas les seuls. Vous voyez des mains se glisser sous des vêtements pour se poser sur des poignées d'armes. Dans la foule qui se tient devant vous, vous apercevez des éclats de métal qui vous sont par trop familiers.{/n}

{n}Mais ce ne sont pas les seuls. Vous voyez des mains se glisser sous des vêtements pour se poser sur des poignées d'armes. Dans la foule qui se tient devant vous, vous apercevez des éclats de métal qui vous sont par trop familiers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lakin tek silahları bunlar değil. Kıyafetlerinin altına uzanan eller, silah kabzalarını kavrıyor. Pek aşina olduğun {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}kurşuni{/g} renkte bir şeyden yansıyan ışık, kalabalığın arasından gözüne çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. You see hands slip under clothes and curl around weapon grips. Somewhere in the crowd, you glimpse the all-too-familiar glint of {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}gun metal{/g}.{/n}
